findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is marked as external and does not have proper access control, which can lead to unauthorized token approvals.

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in transferFrom function allowing unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Withdraw Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The withdraw function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: balanceOf
findings.description: provides account balance of the owner's account

findings.title: Unprotected Function Call in buy
findings.description: The 'buy' function is marked as external and has no access modifier, which may allow unauthorized users to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected External Function 'sell'
findings.description: The 'sell' function is declared as external and lacks access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: safeTransfer
findings.description: The safeTransfer function is used to securely transfer tokens.

findings.title: safeTransferFrom
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in safeTransferFrom function.

findings.title: safeTransferETH
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in safeTransferETH function of TransferHelper library.
